title: Curl Command Syntax Errors
description: During N8N workflow activation attempts, encountered multiple curl command syntax errors with 'blank argument where content is expected' messages. Root cause: Incorrect parameter formatting and problematic jq piping in curl commands for N8N API calls. Issues included improper escaping of JSON data, malformed curl parameter structure, and incorrect use of jq for data processing. Required multiple command reformulations to achieve successful API calls.

solution.description: Successfully resolved by correcting curl command syntax and parameter formatting. Removed problematic jq piping and fixed parameter structure for N8N API calls. Used proper curl syntax with correct header formatting and escaped JSON data. Final working commands successfully activated both workflows (CK9JWj9aapFu26lH and XQ8bFr8gSIOQjWC5) using POST method to /activate endpoint.
